title: Enhancing Service Quality Practice Competencies: Clinical Reasoning Learning Design Through Virtual Patient Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology and Understanding of Patient Assessment Processes
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify differential diagnosis points of symptoms with 80% accuracy in a virtual patient simulation environment.
Learners can systematically apply a three-step reasoning process (information gathering → hypothesis formulation → verification) in complex clinical scenarios.
Learners reduce clinical reasoning errors by 40% through four or more feedback-reflected learning cycles via LMS-based formative assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
